title: BETTER FUCKIN SAVE
content:
Create----> Create Table table_name( column1 data type, column2 data type, column3 data type)
Insert---> Insert Into table_name(column1, column2, column3)
value(value1, value2, value3)
modify record    >update table_name
                                set column1=value1,column2
                                where some_column2=some_value;

Select -----> Select Distinct calumn1, column2
                      From table_name;
